name: Real Girl VR
detailed_description:
Welcome to Real Girl VR!
Are you ready for the best VR experience of your life? Real Girl VR is a sex simulator. Realistic and beautiful, we are bringing the best experience in VR you will have so far!



There are 20 different girls and some awesome locations to experience virtual sex with them. You can use your Mouse or your VR Headset/controllers for interaction.

You can interact with the woman in many ways! Choosing dozens of clothes in the wardrobe, more than 40 sex position, all animated! And many locations to see her in action!
All girls are different from each other with personality, body shape, and ethnicity.

MAIN FEATURES
- 20 fully and detailed naked girls, genitals, and scenarios.
- 3 scenarios.
- + 30 sex animations and a POV camera for all of them.
- + 5 sexy dancing animations.
- sexual face expressions.
- animated sex positions.
- sexy and sensual clothes and voices.
- The sum of Girls + Animations + Locations gives more them 2500 scenes for you.
- use your Mouse or VR Headset
- VR Headset is not mandatory. And for all interactions, you only need one hand.

They are ALL ABOVE 18 YEARS OLD.

Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Steam VR Knuckles and desktop (PC/MacOsX) compatibility!

Controllers:
Oculus Rift with Touch controllers
HTC Vive with trackers
Steam VR Knuckles controllers
Mouse/trackpad
You only need to use one hand to control all animations and poses!

Explain to me more!
This is obviously adult-only and the virtual reality should be used wisely. But be sure to be amazed by how realistic the experience is!

We are constantly adding features like animations and different girls and places for the simulation, also some body interactions, like moving the hair and the breasts using your VR controllers. It is already there! And it is really cool!

To begin a real life inside VR, would be nice to have a Real Girl in your VR, right?

Stay with us on this journey to the most realistic virtual sex experience.

* REAL GIRL VR IS A FULLY INTERACTABLE GAME.
** REAL GIRL VR IS NOT A VIDEO OR A SIMPLE "TOUR" ON THE SCENARIO.
*** YOU DO NOT NEED TO USE A VR HEADSET. WORKS PERFECTLY WITH MOUSE.
**** WITH VR HEADSET IS REALLY AWESOME!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista (32 bit or 64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: You DO NOT need a VR Headset to play this game. But it is awesome with it!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 (32 bit or 64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: You DO NOT need a VR Headset to play this game. But it is awesome with it!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina, Mojave (Liberty), High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite, Mavericks
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: There are no VR devices for MacOS yet. But you can play as a desktop version!
